title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When creating report parameters and setting default values for them, the default values are not displayed in the Show Report Parameters dialog.
EB: The Show Report Parameters dialog should display the default values of the report parameters.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create several report parameters and set default values for them. 2. Drag the report parameters to the Layout. 3. Open the Show Report Parameters dialog and observe that the default values are not visible.
